verses.verse: Oh give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; For he is <S%H2896>good<s%>; For his <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> endureth for <S%H5769>ever<s%>.
Let <S%H3478>Israel<s%> now <S%H559>say<s%>, That his <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> endureth for <S%H5769>ever<s%>.
Let the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> now <S%H559>say<s%>, That his <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> endureth for <S%H5769>ever<s%>.
Let them now that <S%H3373>fear<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>say<s%>, That his <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> endureth for <S%H5769>ever<s%>.
Out of my <S%H4712>distress<s%> I <S%H7121>called<s%> upon <S%H3050>Jehovah<s%>: <S%H3050>Jehovah<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> me and set me in a large <S%H4800>place<s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> is on my <S%H3372>side<s%>; I will not fear: What <S%H6213>can<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> do unto <S%H6213>me<s%>?
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> is on my side among them that <S%H5826>help<s%> <S%H7200>me<s%>: Therefore shall I see my desire upon them that hate <S%H8130>me<s%>.
It is <S%H2896>better<s%> to take <S%H2620>refuge<s%> in <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> Than to put <S%H982>confidence<s%> in <S%H120>man<s%>.
It is <S%H2896>better<s%> to take <S%H2620>refuge<s%> in <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> Than to put <S%H982>confidence<s%> in <S%H5081>princes<s%>.
All <S%H1471>nations<s%> compassed me <S%H5437>about<s%>: In the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> I will cut them <S%H4135>off<s%>.
They compassed me <S%H5437>about<s%>; <S%H5437>yea<s%>, they compassed me about: In the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> I will cut them <S%H4135>off<s%>.

They compassed me <S%H5437>about<s%> like <S%H1682>bees<s%>; They are <S%H1846>quenched<s%> as the <S%H784>fire<s%> of <S%H6975>thorns<s%>: In the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> I will cut them <S%H4135>off<s%>.
Thou didst <S%H1760>thrust<s%> <S%H1760>sore<s%> at me that I might <S%H5307>fall<s%>; But <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> helped <S%H5826>me<s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3050><s%> is my <S%H5797>strength<s%> and <S%H2176>song<s%>; And he is become my <S%H3444>salvation<s%>.

The <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H7440>rejoicing<s%> and <S%H3444>salvation<s%> is in the <S%H168>tents<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%>: The right <S%H3225>hand<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H6213>doeth<s%> <S%H2428>valiantly<s%>.
The right <S%H3225>hand<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> is <S%H7426>exalted<s%>: The right <S%H3225>hand<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H6213>doeth<s%> <S%H2428>valiantly<s%>.
I shall not <S%H4191>die<s%>, but <S%H2421>live<s%>, And <S%H5608>declare<s%> the <S%H4639>works<s%> of <S%H3050>Jehovah<s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3050><s%> hath <S%H3256>chastened<s%> me <S%H3256>sore<s%>; But he hath not given me <S%H5414>over<s%> unto <S%H4194>death<s%>.
Open <S%H6605><s%> to me the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of <S%H6664>righteousness<s%>: I will <S%H935>enter<s%> into <S%H3034>them<s%>, I will give thanks unto <S%H3050>Jehovah<s%>.
This is the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; The <S%H6662>righteous<s%> shall enter into <S%H935>it<s%>.
I will give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> unto <S%H6030>thee<s%>; for thou hast answered <S%H3444>me<s%>, And art become my salvation.
The <S%H68>stone<s%> which the <S%H1129>builders<s%> <S%H3988>rejected<s%> Is become the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H6438>corner<s%>.
This is <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>'s <S%H6381>doing<s%>; It is marvellous in our <S%H5869>eyes<s%>.
This is the <S%H3117>day<s%> which <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> hath <S%H6213>made<s%>; We will <S%H1523>rejoice<s%> and be glad in <S%H1523>it<s%>.
Save <S%H3467><s%> <S%H577>now<s%>, we beseech <S%H3068>thee<s%>, O Jehovah: O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, we <S%H577>beseech<s%> <S%H6743>thee<s%>, send now prosperity.
Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be he that <S%H935>cometh<s%> in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>: We have <S%H1288>blessed<s%> you out of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> is <S%H410>God<s%>, and he hath given us <S%H215>light<s%>: <S%H631>Bind<s%> the <S%H2282>sacrifice<s%> with <S%H5688>cords<s%>, even unto the <S%H7161>horns<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%>.
Thou art my <S%H410>God<s%>, and I will give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> unto <S%H430>thee<s%>: Thou art my God, I will exalt <S%H7311>thee<s%>.
Oh give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; For he is <S%H2896>good<s%>; For his <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> endureth for <S%H5769>ever<s%>.
